path.style: font-size: 12px; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke-width: 0.625; stroke-linejoin: round;
font-size: 12px; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke-width: 0.625; stroke-linejoin: round;
fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: black; stroke-width: 1pt; marker-start: none;

overflow: visible; marker: none; color: black; fill: rgb(204, 204, 204); fill-opacity: 0.686275; fill-rule: nonzero; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1; visibility: visible; display: inline;

overflow: visible; marker: none; color: black; fill: white; fill-opacity: 0.686275; fill-rule: nonzero; stroke: black; stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1; visibility: visible; display: inline;

text.style: font-size: 24px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; font-family: Bitstream Vera Sans;
